title: Rocksteady's Suicide Squad Game - Kinda Funny Games Daily 08.07.20
description:
Greg and Blessing talk your ear off about Suicide Squad, Apple being boneheads about xCloud, and more!

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:04:42 - Housekeeping
Fall Guys Let’s Play is on youtube.com/kindafunnygames
We’re streaming the Avengers Beta today at 2 pm PT. Look for it Sunday on youtube.com/kindafunnygames.
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Mohammed Mohammed & Black Jack
The Roper Report   -
00:07:00 - Rocksteady’s New Game is OFFICIALLY Suicide Squad
Katie G
00:11:05 - Why do you think Rocksteady, after years of silence, would reveal Suicide Squad with a tweet? - Best Friends Q:The 5 Star Man
00:31:01 - Do you think a Suicide Squad game will be anything like the Arkham games, with a main character and single player story, or will it lean into the ensemble cast and go more towards Square's Avengers?  - Best Friends Q:The Nano Biologist
00:31:40 - What could the sale of WB game studios mean for the future of the game? -  Best Friends Q:The Nano Biologist
00:37:25 - Call of Duty Announcement Incoming
00:40:02 - xCloud not being on iOS is Apple’s Fault, Nick Statt @ The Verge
00:52:40 - Doom Eternal is getting a Campaign Expansion, Geoff K on Twitter
00:54:15 - Final Fantasy 7 Remake Sells Five Million, Richard Wakeling @ GameSpot
00:54:48 - Aeon Must Die Dev Drama, James Batchelor @ GIB
00:59:35 - Out today
00:57:45 -  HIMS
01:01:40 - Squad Up: Jordan Deeb(PS4) - JordanDeeb28
01:03:40 - You‘re Wrong
Next Week’s Hosts:
Monday: Blessing and Tim
Tuesday: Blessing and Imran
Wednesday: Greg and Gary Whitta
Thursday: Blessing and Greg
Friday: Greg and Rhi from What’s Good Games00:00:00 - Start
00:04:42 - Housekeeping
